card_description: [Nether Step] Nether Step now has 3 separate charges and is no longer linked.
[Defiance] Successful hits with your Revolver increase the damage of your next Defiance by 20%, stacking up to 100%.
[Reversal] Reversal always fires back and does an additional 800 damage.
[Shoulder Bash] Reduce your damage taken by 75% while using Shoulder Bash.
[Siege Shield] Increase Siege Shield's maximum Health by 2500 and its size by 50%, but reduce its Movement Speed by 80%.
[Weapon] Your weapon shots travel 50% faster, 100% farther, and deal 50 more damage, but no longer explode.
[Setback] Setback becomes a lobbed explosive, capable of Rewinding multiple enemies.
[Stasis Field] Greatly increase the size of Stasis Field, but its Duration is decreased to 3.5 seconds and its Cooldown is increased to 18s.
[Second Chance] When you use Second Chance you also Rewind enemies within 20 units 3s into the past.
Your Ire no longer decays due to not taking or dealing damage, but you no longer gain the passive damage increase while above Ire threshold.
Gain 30% Lifesteal on your hits with Judgement.
Reckoning’s damage and size, Sanctuary’s health, and Conviction’s range increase by 50%, base Cooldowns increase by 25%.
[Dome Shield] Dome Shield now costs 40% Ultimate charge and places a Flamethrower Turret with modified values and no Shield. Can have two active at once.
[Barricade] Increase the maximum Health of Barricade by 2000 and reduce its Cooldown by 3s.
[Weapon] Modify your Blunderbuss to fire a single slug that deals 600 damage.
[Hail of Bombs] Reduce the range of Hail of Bombs by 50%, concentrating the explosions in a smaller area, and reduce the Cooldown of Hail of Bombs by 2s.
[Weapon] Hitting an enemy with Grenade Launcher sets them on fire for 0.175% of their maximum Health every 0.1s for 1.5s. Additional hits refresh the duration.
[Explosive Personality] Reduce the Cooldown of Explosive Personality by 5s, but reduce your Movement Speed by 15%.
[Grumpy Bomb] Reduces the time it takes for Grumpy Bomb to explode by 40%.
[Detonate] Hitting with more than one Sticky Bomb on a use of Detonate increases the damage of each explosion after the first by 30% of its base damage, up to 150%.
[Weapon] Poppy Bomb now has 2 charges, but reduce its Knockback strength against enemies by 40%.
[Heroic Leap] Heroic Leap deals 600 damage and applies a Knockback to enemies within 20 units of your landing location.
[Recovery] Using Recovery instantly Heals you for 400 and increases your maximum Health by 300 for 5s.
[Net Shot] Increase the damage you deal to targets Slowed by Net Shot by 20% and increases the duration of Net Shot's Slow by 0.5s. The damage increase lasts a minimum of 2s.

The Cooldown of Deadly Momentum is permanently set to 5s and cannot be modified, reduced, or increased through other means. Gain 1 stack of Piercing and Sharp Momentum for each enemy hit with Deadly Momentum.
[War] Increase the Damage of War by 50, but decrease its rate of fire by 20%. War's attacks now deal an additional 20% damage to each enemy hit for each enemy hit in total with your attack.
Automatically fire a weaker copy of Rogue's Tempo for every 4 Ammo consumed. This copy deals 400 damage and Slows enemies by 20% for 0.5s.
[Disengage] For 4s after hitting an enemy with Disengage, your weapon shots deal an additional 8% of that enemy's maximum Health as damage.
[Dodge Roll] For 8s after using Dodge Roll, your next weapon shot's damage is increased by 30%.
[Blast Shot] Blast Shot has its damage increased by 150 and its Cooldown decreased by 2s.
[Abyssal Reconstruction] Your Marked ally gains 15% Crowd Control reduction, 15% Cooldown reduction, 15% Reload Speed increase, and they are Healed for 75 every 1s.
[Mark of Fate] Decrease the percentage of Healing given to Marked targets by 20%, but you can have two Marks out at a time.
[Projection] Enemies hit by Projection are stunned for 1s and any enemy caught between your Projection and you when you Teleport takes 800 damage.
[Harpoon] Harpoon lodges into terrain and explodes when an enemy comes within 20 units, dealing 1000 damage in a 35-unit-radius area.
[Harpoon] Harpoon no longer has a Cooldown, but no longer Slows enemies hit.
[Weapon] Cursed Howitzer's Abyssal Reload now explodes in a 20-unit-radius area on contact.
[Fire Spit] Fire Spit applies a Knockback and deals an additional 300 damage over 2s.
[Weapon] Damage dealt when hitting an enemy directly with Rocket Launcher or Salvo is increased by 25%.
[Armor] Increase your Movement Speed by 50% while using your Booster.
[Soar] Increase the damage you deal with your weapon shots by 25% for 3s after Soar ends.
[Ice Storm] Ice Storm has its damage increased by 100% and its Ultimate charge decreased by 50%, but its duration is reduced to 3s.
[Blink] Blink leaves behind a magical wormhole. Refire Blink within 4s of its use to return to the wormhole.
[Shield] Increase Chivarly's Shield to 5500, and it begins regenerating 25% sooner and 25% faster. You now only need 20% Shield to activate Chivalry after it is broken.
[Charge] You now have 2 charges of Charge, each Charge deals an additional 100 damage, and you are Immune to Crowd Control while Charging, but the Cooldown of Charge is increased to 13s.
[Fireball] Increase the damage of Fireball by 35%, decrease its Cooldown by 1s, and deal 20% increased damage for each subsequent target hit after the first.
[Kindle Soul] Kindle Soul also heals allies within 50 units of your target at 50% effectiveness. Excludes yourself.
[Wrath] Increase the Attack Speed bonus of Wrath to 15% per tier.
[Pyre Strike] Pyre Strike now can be stopped by refire & Heals yourself and allies within for 175 every 0.1s. Allies continue to heal for 1.5s on exit.
[Shock Pulse] Increase the damage of Lightning Staff to 75, your weapon shots reduce the Cooldown of Shock Pulse by 0.5s, and Shock Pulse chains 4 additional times.
[Weapon] Hitting allies with your Lightning Staff Heals them for 800 per second and increases their Movement Speed by 20% for 1s, and your maximum Ammo capacity is increased by 25%.
[Healing Totem] Gain a third charge of Healing Totem and increase their radius by 20%.
[Crippling Throw] Crippling Throw now instead Roots targets affected. Remedy (+5% Damage and +10% Healing Done)
[Weapon] Increase your maximum damage scaling over distance by 60%. Surgery (+10% Damage Done)
[Vine] Heal for a burst of 300 and an additional 200 over 2s in a 50 unit radius at your location when you finish Vining. Curative (+20% Healing Done)
[Armor] Remaining still for 1s creates a 30-unit Mana Rift around you that generates Mana every 1s. Leaving the Mana Rift destroys it.
[Pyre Ball] Each of your Pyre Balls explodes in a 20-unit-radius area on hit and generate more Mana, but the damage of Pyre Ball when fully charged is reduced to 800.
[Frost Bolt] Frost Bolt Chains to a nearby enemy within 30 units, dealing 225 damage.
[Earthen Guard] Increase the Damage Reduction of Earthen Guard by 10% and gain Immunity to Crowd Control while Earthen Guard is active.
[Warder's Field] The radius of Warder's Field is increased by 50% and it Cripples enemies within it.
[Impasse] Impasse now has 2 charges and its Cooldown is reduced to 12s, but you are unable to destroy your walls.
[Moonlight] Allies being Healed by Moonlight take 15% reduced damage.
[Guardian Spirit] [Guardian Spirit] When Io or Luna heal an ally other than each other, the other is also healed at 50% efficiency.
[Guardian Spirit] [Guardian Spirit] If Io falls below 200 Health while Luna is active, she trades places with Luna, Heals for 50% of her Health, and Luna dies in her stead.
[Weapon] Star Splitter now deals 360 damage every 0.4s, but reduces your maximum Ammo to 15.
[Astral Mark] All allies already affected by Astral Mark are Healed for an additional 285 when you use Astral Mark.
[Void Grip] Enemies affected by Void Grip are Crippled and take an additional 480 damage over its duration.
Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 3% and Movement Speed by 5% per stack of Curse currently on enemies.
When a Spirit Trap is triggered, reactivate to teleport to the trap and detonate it. Increase the explosion radius by 25%, Curse stacks applied by 2, and it Fears instead of Slowing.
After the Body and Soul ends, Heal for 70% of the damage your body took (minimum of 15% max health) while traveling, unaffected by Anti-Healing.
[Bulwark] Your Shield now regenerates at 120% effectiveness, and regenerates even while it is active.
[Weapon] Increase your Attack Speed by 60%, but reduce your damage-per-shot by 25%.
[Commander's Grab] Targets hit by Commander's Grab are Stunned for an additional 1.4s.

[Oppressor Mine] You can have two additional Oppressor Mines out at one time and you throw out two Mines per use of the ability instead of one, but your Mines have a lifetime of 6s and the Cooldown of Oppressor Mine is increased by 2s.
[Transporter] Using Transporter instantly Teleports you to its target location.
[Sniper Mode] For 4s after hitting a fully-charged weapon shot, your next fully-charged shot will deal an additional 20% damage.
[Weapon] Generate 1 Energy for every 80 damage done with your Submachine Guns.
[Cyclone Strike] Cyclone Strike deals 125% of its target's maximum Health as damage over its duration and your Movement Speed is increased by 25% during the attack.
[Dragon Stance] Dragon Stance consumes Health instead of Energy at a rate of 200 Health per second. Dragon Stance requires at least 300 Health to activate and automatically cancels at 15 Health.
[Weapon] Your weapon shots deal 680 damage every 0.7s, but your maximum Ammo count is reduced by 6.
[Retribution] Increase the damage you deal to your Retribution target by 15%.
[Combat Slide] Gain Immunity to Crowd Control and reduce your damage taken by 50% while using Combat Slide. Increase Combat Slide's Cooldown to 8s.
[Grace] Grace now hits all enemies in front of you instead of only one, but its Cooldown is increased by 1s.
[Presence] Increase the damage of Presence by up to 50% based on the range at which it hits and reduce its Cooldown by 4s.
[Weapon] Hitting an enemy with Heirloom Rifle increases your Heirloom Rifle damage against that enemy by 7% for 5s, stacking up to 5 times.
[Armor] Decrease the Blood cost of your abilities by 35% and increase your Healing done by 15%, but reduce the damage you do by 25%.
[Swarm] Swarm is now cast on yourself and follows you around instead of being placed on the ground, its ability cost is decreased by 25%, and its radius is increased by 30%.
[Weapon] Hitting an enemy with Heart of Crimson while they're affected by Blood Hex or Swarm increases your movement by 10% and attack speed by 11% for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times.
[Prowl] Increase the damage of each of your daggers from your first two Dagger sets within 3s of Prowl ending by 25%.
[Armor] Increase the damage done by Pounce by 15%, reduce its Cooldown by 2s, and reset Pounce's Cooldown after earning an Elimination.
[Pounce] Pounce Executes targets at or below 35% Health.
[Shell Shield] Shell Shield is placed on the ground instead of channeled around you, and lasts 2s longer.
[Ancient Rage] Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 25% and Health by 500. Activating Ancient Rage resets the Cooldown of Dredge Anchor and Shell Spin, and increases Movement Speed by 20%.
[Dredge Anchor] For 4s after hitting an enemy with Dredge Anchor, your next weapon shot against that enemy deals 75% increased damage.
[Mending Spirits] Your Gourd deals 40% less damage to enemies, but it Heals for twice as much.
[Mending Spirits] Mending Spirits heals an additional 350 Health instantly.
[Weapon] Your Snake Toss projectile travels 60% faster and deals an additional 500 damage.
[Weapon] Detonating a Magic Mark also damages all enemies within 15 units of the victim for 75% of its damage.

[Armor] When you get an Elimination, drop a Health Pack that Heals the entire team for 900 when picked up by an ally. Health Packs are visible to allies and are not able to be seen or interacted with by the opposing team.
[Scamper] Using Scamper Heals you and allies within 25 units of your starting location for 600 over 3s.
Enemies that pass through Abyssal Fortress are Revealed and take 10% additional weapon damage from you and your allies for 3s. Reduce Abyssal Fortress' Cooldown by 2s.
Rift Slash Cripples enemies it hits for 1.25s, and the resulting Abyssal Rift lasts 1s longer.
Royal Presence's reactivation now only hits the first enemy in its path, and instead Roots them for 2.25s. Increase the Range of the reactivation by 50%.
Distortion Field now damages enemies for 200 every .5s for the duration of Distortion Field and heals allies for 125 every .5 seconds while inside of the field.
Enemies are rooted in place when they are hit by the pre fire beam and the Creeping Barrage deals 1450 damage.

Upon landing with the Commanding Leap ability create a small pool underneath you that will heal both you and allies for 600 health over 1.5s. Octavia's ammo is not consumed while standing inside of this field.
[Aphotic Reaver] Aphotic Reaver is no longer ramps down, but its spread is reduced by 50% and its fire rate is reduced by 30%.
[Explosive Flask] Enemies hit with Explosive Flask take 35% increased damage from your weapon shots for 4s. Surgery (+10% Damage Done)
[Weapon] Potion Launcher also Heals allies hit for 700 and your Potion Launcher fire rate is increased by 10%. You no longer take damage from your weapon shots. Curative (+20% Healing Done)
[Healing Potion] Healing Potion's Healing is increased by 100% and now provides a Stacking 200 Shield. Remedy (+5% Damage and +10% Healing Done)
[Cataclysm] Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 60%.
[Juggernaut] Gain 1.2s of Crowd Control Immunity and reduce your damage taken by 40% while using Juggernaut.
[Soul Harvest] All your living allies are Healed for 1.5% of their maximum Health for each Soul Harvested.
Increase the range of Chain Heal bounces by 40%.
[Spirit Link] Spirit Link's Cooldown is increased to 7s and it now only lasts for 4s, but its base effects are tripled.
[Spirit Link] While Envelop is active and you are Linked to an enemy, prevent them from Healing.
[Advance] Advance gains a 3rd charge and activating Advance while standing still causes you to jet upwards.
[Emitter] Increase the Shield granted by Emitter by 1500, and reduce its Cooldown by 1s. While Emitter is active, gain Immunity to Crowd Control.
[Missile Launcher] Increase the radius of Missile Launcher's explosions by 66%.
Ricocheted shots now target two enemies and deal 200% more damage to Shields, but only deal 200 damage.
The Dead Ringer Decoy is now rigged to explode! The Dead Ringer decoy will now explode when enemies are close, dealing 650 damage to enemies within a 20 unit radius.
Blast Back now knocks enemies straight up and enemies take 20% more DMG from Saati for 1.5s.
[Restore Soul] For each stack of Soul Orb detonated by Rend Soul, your next Restore Soul ignores 5% of Anti-Healing (excluding Healing disable effects) up to 25% (5 stacks) for up to 10s.
[Shadow Travel] You can use Restore Soul during Shadow Travel, and Shadow Travel lasts 1s longer.
[Rend Soul] Each Soul Charge you detonate with Rend Soul increases your maximum Health and weapon damage by 2% until you die. Stacks up to 12 times.
[Crippling Arrow] Reduce the Cooldown of Crippling Arrow by 1s. Crippling Arrow now Silences and Slows enemies by 15% for 2s instead.
[Weapon] Increase the rate at which your Longbow charges by 25%.

[Crippling Arrow] Crippling Arrow now explodes in a 20-unit-radius area on contact, dealing 300 additional damage to enemies hit, but the Cripple applied by Crippling Arrow has its duration reduced by 1s and its Cooldown is increased by 1s.
[Poison Bolts] Increase the damage done by Poison Bolts by 15% and the rate at which they deal damage by 75%.
[Armor] Hidden gains a second charge and refills Wrist Crossbow's Ammo. While Hidden is active, reduce the damage you take by 50%. Permanently set the maximum duration of Hidden to 4s.
[Smoke Screen] Benefits from your Smoke Screen cards also benefit allies who enter Smoke Screen and allies are Healed for 150 every 1s while in your Smoke Screen.
[Weapon] Talon Rifle gains non-scoped Accuracy, but deals 900 Damage and applies a 50 damage Burn over 1.5s. Stackable 3 times and refreshes on hit.
[Stealth] Reduce the rate of Stealth Energy consumption by 50% and increase your Movement Speed by 20% while in Stealth.
[Flare] Flare deals 250% base damage, has significantly increased Projectile Speed, and has its Cooldown reduced by 10s, but no longer Reveals enemies.
[Rune of Travel] Rune of Travel no longer automatically activates, and if the Rune is not used the Cooldown is reset.
[Rune of Travel] Reduce the Cooldown of Overcharge and Blitz Upper by 6s when you Teleport using Rune of Travel.
[True Power] Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 15% and enemies at or below 65% Health are Revealed to you.
[Shatterfall] Shatterfall Stuns enemies hit for 1s, but no longer Slows.
[Calamity Blast] Each Calamity Blast deals an additional 100 damage.
[Armor] Reduce the damage you take by 20% while at or below 50% Health.
[Weapon] Bladed Chakrams are able to bounce 2 additional times before disappearing.
[Heavy Blade] Heavy Blade now explodes on reactivation instead of recalling, but the initial throw does reduced damage.
[Crouching Tigron] Crouching Tigron now has 2 charges and deals 600 damage in a 20-unit-radius area on landing.
[Nullify] Double the range at which you can use Nullify.
[Protection] Increase the damage done by allies by 10% while they are Shielded by Protection.
[Protection] Increase Protection's Shield Health by 300 and reduce its Cooldown by 1s.
[Fire Bomb] Fire Bomb deals 30% increased damage and applies a 60% reduce healing effect.
[Hunter's Mark] Hunter's Mark now grants its damage bonus to allies.
[Nade Launcher] Nade Launcher has 3 charges, but reduce the damage of each to 650.
[Weapon] Reduce the Cooldown of your basic abilities by 10% after hitting an enemy with at least one Kunai. This can activate only once per throw and once every 3s.
[Ambush] Your Ambush gains an additional teleport and can now be used on allies.
[Shadow Bombs] Increase the explosion radius of Shadow Bombs by 5 units and they now home to enemies.
Your Grappling Hook now pulls non-Frontline Champions to you.
Increase the travel distance of Explosive Dodge by 30%, and drop explosive traps at both your starting and ending locations.
Upgrade your Heavy SMG with the elements. Burst Mode shocks enemies, damaging and Revealing them, Mag Dump adds a Burn over time, and Automatic freezes enemies, Slowing them.
[Weapon] Switch your rifle to Three-Shot-Burst mode, increasing your effective range and firing three 210-damage shots every 0.5s.
[Hustle] Heal for 300 per second while using Hustle.
[Frag Grenade] Increase the radius of Frag Grenade's explosion by 40%.
[Sensor Drone] Your Sensor Drones explode, dealing 600 damage and applying a Knockback to those hit when an enemy is within 20 units.
[Weapon] After firing continuously for 2s, gain 10% increased damage.
[Armor] Deflector Shield's Health is increased by 500. Reduce its Cooldown by half if it is destroyed by an enemy, this Cooldown reduction can only occur once every 9s.
[Obliteration] Obliteration now Silences enemies hit for 2.5s.
[Tendril] Tendril gains a second charge, but its Cooldown is increased by 2s.
Your Dark Siphon now deals an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health as damage over 1.5s.
[Weapon] Hitting an enemy with your weapon shots increases the damage they take from weapon shots by 20% for 3s, stacking up to 4 times.
[Dead Zone] Dead Zone damage is increased to 650.
[Seedling] Increase the damage of each Seedling to 750 and reduce the time it takes for them to explode by 25%.
[Caustic Spray] Augment your acid, increasing the damage done by Caustic Spray to 42, the damage of acid pools to 40, and increase the Movement Speed of allies within your acid pools by 20%.

[Primal Vision] Allied players within range of your Primal Vision gain a stackable 90-Health Shield and 15% increased Movement Speed for 4s each time you pulse, but your Primal Vision has its Cooldown increased by 2s.
[Armor] Heal for 110 every 1s while on an objective and for 1s after leaving the objective. This effect increases the longer you maintain it, up to 275 every 1s.
[Weapon] Deal an additional 200 damage to an enemy if you hit them with all 5 shots of Illusory Mirror.
[Shatter] Shatter instantly Heals your target for 800, but its Cooldown is increased by 1s and it no longer explodes your Illusions. Reduce the Cooldown of Shatter by 2s if you miss.
[Shatter] If an Illusion is killed or expires, it triggers a Shatter explosion, dealing 550 damage. Also increases your Shattered Illusions' Movement Speed by 65% and Explosion Radius by 5 units.
[Spite] Spite deals 20% of its target's maximum Health with each hit.
[Billow] Heal for 15% of your maximum Health per second while using Billow.
[Weapon] Your heavy hit with Inferno Blade deals an additional 150 damage.
